articles.author: Michael Tullier
articles.title: Decades-long quest leads to first scholarly accurate fossil replica of 'dinosaur-killer' croc - Phys.org
articles.description: Dr. David Schwimmer, an expert on the giant North American crocodilian genus Deinosuchus and a Columbus State University geology professor, has contributed his research to the creation of the first-ever scholarly accurate, mounted skeleton replica of the spec…
